description.value:
Trigger you roll Perception for initiative, use an Interact action to sheathe a Samurai Weapon, or land a critical hit using a Samurai Weapon

Requirements You are wearing or wielding a Samurai Weapon and wielding no other weapons or shields other than a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e-adventures-in-etheirys.equipment.Item.TfrKQ49bwfYJWeEU]{Saya}, or you are wielding two Samurai Weapons, one in each hand

You quickly sheathe your blade and enter a calm pose. While in this stance, you gain the following benefits.

  • Since your weapon is sheathed, it cannot be disarmed (though a creature can still attempt to steal the weapon from you through other means, such as through the Thievery skill).
  • You can make Strikes using your sheathed Samurai Weapon and are considered to be wielding it for the purposes of actions, feats and class features.

When you make your first Strike while in this stance, you automatically unsheathe your weapon as part of that action, ending the stance immediately after the Strike.
